page.title: 13Tourism in Hebden Bridge (2)
page.content: People come to{Hebden Bridge}for many different reasons. Hebden Bridge has the Rochdale Canal passing through it and several{boat trips}go up and down it. There are a few{sports facilities}in the park, like tennis, bowling and putting. The{scenery}around Hebden bridge attracts photographers, artists and sightseers. Several television crews have been to film as well. There are good{walks}around Hebden Bridge and several{horse riding}establishments. School parties also come to look around. There is a{market}on thursdays and several art, craft and bric-a-brac shops which people come for. {Anglers}come to fish in one of our rivers. There is the Hebden Lodge Hotel and quite a few cafes.
